name: Dutch Alps
description: This variation on the classic Irish Cocktail uses genever instead of Irish whiskey, and herbal genepy instead of absinthe. Rather than sweetening with orange curaçao, this one calls for rich, citrusy Amaro Nonino.

recipeInstructions.text: Add genever, genepy, Amaro Nonino, maraschino, saline solution, and orange bitters to a mixing glass. Full with ice and stir until well chilled, about 20 seconds.
Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with lemon twist and serve.
